name: NPR
text:
A federal judge is threatening to call Postmaster General Louis DeJoy to testify after the USPS delayed a required sweep of facilities for mail-in ballots by an hour on Tuesday afternoon.
https://t.co/7XB3FvQ5QB

name: NPR
text:
University of Pittsburgh medical students wrote a new version of the Hippocratic Oath, which calls on doctors to combat disinformation to improve health literacy and be an ally to minorities.
https://t.co/UMrRuwfsrI
